title: Ristorante Zi Teresa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers dishes of the local cuisine of Romagna with vegan labelled on the menu like vegan ravioli, seitan with vegetables, vegan tiramisu. In summertime offers a vegan buffet on Friday and Saturday for dinner and on Sunday for lunch. Located in the countryside 20 km south of Rimini.
